body.name: Franco Sonic The Hedgehog Anime Kids Bedding Twin/Full Comforter with Twin Sheet Set and Cuddle Pillow, 5 Piece Bedroom Set (Official Sega Licensed Product)
features: 5 PIECE TWIN SIZE BEDDING & MINI CUDDLE PILLOW SET INCLUDES: 1 fitted sheet 39" (W) x 75" (L) ) featuring deep pockets and fits 10-12" thick mattress. 1 flat sheet 66" (W) x 96" (L). 1 standard pillow case 20" x 30". 1 twin/full reversible comforter 72" (W) x 86" (L). 1 cuddle pillow 12.5" x 5.25. Designed to fit a standard twin size bed.

SUPER SOFT EASY CARE CHILDREN’S BED IN A BAG: The microfiber material is super soft and long lasting, keeping kids warm and cozy all night or while camping. This high-quality bed set with cuddle pillow is an enduring choice that's sure to become a favorite. You can throw the bed sheets and comforter into the washer and dryer without worrying about the colorful themed pattern and animated cartoon characters fading. The material is wrinkle-resistant, making it a great choice for any child's bedroom or nursery as a home decor accessory. Spot clean the plush cuddle pillow as needed.

TWO DESIGNS IN ONE COMFORTER: Easily change up the look of your child’s bedroom with the reversible comforter from this set. It features large colorful character imagery on one side and an all-over logo print on the other side.

SONIC THE HEDGEHOG DESIGN: Sonic brings his high-speed style to bedtime with this cool and colorful bedding set. Featuring Sonic The Hedgehog, Shadow The Hedgehog, Tails, and Knuckles The Echidna from the popular Sega franchise, this action-packed set is sure to be a hit with young gamers. Animated Sonic The Hedgehog character imagery and vibrant primary colors pop against black on the stylish videogame-themed design.
body.description: Give your child's bedroom a supersonic makeover with this exciting bedding set featuring Sonic The Hedgehog, Shadow The Hedgehog, Tails, and Knuckles The Echidna from the popular Sonic franchise. Bold colors and an action-packed design bring the fun and friendly adventures of the iconic Sega superstar to this soft and stylish bedding set. This high-quality microfiber set includes a comforter, fitted sheet, flat sheet, pillowcase(s), and a mini Sonic cuddle pillow! One side of the reversible comforter features lively Sonic character imagery on a black backdrop while a colorful all-over pattern of character silhouettes and playful sayings pop on the blue background of the reverse side. The cozy flat sheet, top sheet, and pillowcase(s) add to the look with coordinating "Come On Step it Up!" patterned design in bold, primary colors. Fast-paced action, engaging graphics, and colorful characters continue to attract new generations of Sega fans to the world of Sonic The Hedgehog. Help ensure your little gamer is rested up for racing each morning by giving him a good night’s sleep in this fun and functional bedding set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this bedding set for my 5 yr old for Christmas and he loves it!! He likes bringing the comforter to the livingroom to lounge. With the price I was hoping it'd come with an extra pillow case but it does not. But still a great set, and awesome quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son love his new set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bedding is like any other children's bedding. My son loved the design! Colors are vibrant even after washing (I used tap-cold setting on my washer). The plush is small but practical for a twin sized bed. I was happy that this set came with everything from a fitted to the pillowcase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got for my grandson. He loves it. Sleeps in his own bed FINALLY!

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My son loves this!
reviews.reviewText: Great quality and pattern! Really comfy! My son loved it!
